parameters.xGmRaw: subject:task OR subject:todo OR subject:schedule OR +urgent OR from:incredibuilds.group@gmail.com

parameters.name: markSeen
parameters.label: Mark email message(s) as read when fetched

parameters.name: handleErrors
parameters.label: Evaluate all states as errors (except for 2xx and 3xx )

expect.name: shareCookies
expect.label: Share cookies with other HTTP modules

expect.name: rejectUnauthorized
expect.label: Reject connections that are using unverified (self-signed) certificates

expect.name: useQuerystring
expect.label: Disable serialization of multiple same query string keys as arrays

mapper.html:
Hi {{1.from.name}},

Thanks for your email. Could you provide a bit more detail about the task (e.g., due date and expected outcome)?

Best regards
mapper.subject: RE:{{1.subject}}

expect.name: useDefault
expect.label: Use the default reminder settings for this event

expect.name: sendUpdates
expect.label: Send notifications about the event creation

mapper.text: Please check your mail, There seems to be a duplicated task
